Stitches.name: Hook
Stitches.description: Pull the first enemy hit towards you, temporarily stunning them and dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage.

Stitches.name: Slam
Stitches.description: Deal 104 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

Stitches.name: Devour
Stitches.description: Deal 319 (+4% per level) damage to non-Heroic units, or 114 (+4% per level) damage to Heroes. Restores 20% of your maximum Health.

Stitches.name: Putrid Bile
Stitches.description: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. You gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

Stitches.name: Gorge
Stitches.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.  Cannot be used on massive Heroes.

Stitches.name: Vile Gas
Stitches.description: When damaged, Stitches emits a gas cloud that poisons nearby enemies for 68 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

Stitches.name: Helping Hand
Stitches.description: Pull the first ally or enemy hit towards you. Enemies are temporarily stunned and take 91 (+4% per level) damage. When used to pull allies, the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

1.name: Chew Your Food
1.description: Using Devour also heals you for 10% of your max Health over 3 seconds.

1.name: Dampen Magic
1.description: Every 8 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

1.name: Hungry for More
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your maximum Health by 30, up to 900.  Reward: Upon gathering 30 Globes, increase Movement Speed by 10%.

4.name: Amplified Healing
4.description: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.

4.name: Restorative Fumes
4.description: Whenever Vile Gas damages an enemy Hero, you are healed for 27 (+4% per level) Health.

4.name: Putrid Ground
4.description: Enemies hit by Slam are infected with Vile Gas.

7.name: Savor the Flavor
7.description: Quest: Using Devour on an enemy Hero permanently increases your Health Regeneration by 2 per second.

7.name: Last Bite
7.description: If an enemy dies within 3 seconds of being damaged by Devour, its cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds.

7.name: Tenderizer
7.description: Basic Attacks slow enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Toxic Gas
7.description: Increases Vile Gas' radius by 25% and its damage by 50%.

10.name: Putrid Bile
10.description: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. You gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

10.name: Gorge
10.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.  Cannot be used on massive Heroes.

13.name: Flea Bag
13.description: Whenever you are stunned or rooted, reduce your Basic Ability cooldowns by 6 seconds.

13.name: Mega Smash
13.description: Range and arc of Slam increased by 25%.

13.name: Indigestion
13.description: Using Devour also creates a Retchling that applies Vile Gas Poison when it attacks.

16.name: Pulverize
16.description: Decreases Slam's cooldown by 2 seconds and it also slows enemies by 75% for 1 second.

16.name: Shish Kabob
16.description: Hook can pull up to 2 targets.

16.name: Stoneskin
16.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.

20.name: Potent Bile
20.description: Putrid Bile lasts 6 seconds longer and its slow amount is increased from 35% to 45%.

20.name: Hungry Hungry Stitches
20.description: For 4 seconds after using Gorge, Stitches can teleport a short distance to additional targets and Gorge them.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.

20.name: Cannibalize
20.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Stitches for 5% of his maximum Health.
